sentences.cn: …一块儿在烤架上滋滋作响的牛排。

sentences.en: Gretchen chewed energetically on the gristled steak.
sentences.cn: 格蕾琴费劲地嚼着那块带软骨的牛排。

sentences.en: He prefers his steak well done.
sentences.cn: 他喜欢吃煎得熟透的牛排。

sentences.en: I chomped hungrily through the large steak.
sentences.cn: 我狼吞虎咽地吃着那一大块牛排。

sentences.en: I put a forkful of fillet steak in my mouth.
sentences.cn: 我叉了一块无骨牛排放进嘴里。

sentences.en: I put another steak on the barbecue.
sentences.cn: 我在烤架上又放了一块肉排。

sentences.en: I specifically asked for this steak rare.
sentences.cn: 我明确要求把这份牛排煎得偏生一些。

sentences.en: I'll have the steak and chicken combo platter.
That steak is bony and difficult to eat.
sentences.cn: 那种牛排多骨,很不易吃.

sentences.en: The steak is so delicious that he's licking his lips.
sentences.cn: 牛排这么香,使得他垂涎欲滴了.

sentences.en: The steak was so tough that he couldn't eat it.
The steak was tough and the peas were like bullets.
sentences.cn: 牛排老得嚼不动，豌豆像子弹一样硬。
他们大口大口地吃牛排.

sentences.en: Waiter, I specifically asked for this steak rare.
sentences.cn: 服务员，我特别强调了这块牛排要做得嫩些。

sentences.en: We cooked the steak over live coals.
sentences.cn: 我们是把牛排放在燃烧的煤上烤的.

phrases.tran_cn: 菲力牛排；里脊扒；里脊肉牛排

trans.tran_en: good quality  beef  , or a large thick piece of any good quality red meat
